column1: the_constitution_desc;Created long ago in the Independence Hall of Philadelphia
column2: it contains the supreme laws of the United States and its Successor. Even after the Event
column3: new amendments have been continued to be added by the Federal Government.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bolt_pistol_desc;An unique and rare remnant of antideluvian gun making even among more commonly found firearms. This pistol has been maintained for generations but its supply of ammunition has been ravaged by the test of time
column2: still being useful in changing the tides of battle with its presence however.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: salih_book_martial_1_desc;This book is the original copy of the Salihi Mahdi's works. The book is an interesting case among the writings of Salih
column2: being a firsthand account of his attempted conquest of the Mississipi. While never completed by Salih himself
column3: only by his students it is none on the less an important historical and strategic document.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: salih_book_learning_1_desc;This book is the original copy of the Salihi Mahdi's works. One of the most important books among the muslims of America
column2: even if some may view it as heretical
column3: it contains the Salihi Creed and Theology viewed from the prespective of the Mahdi himself.;;;;;;;;;x
